name: Armourcraft Assault EARLY ACCESS
description:
Take charge as the pilot of a high-tech armoured hovercraft! fight your way through enemy territory to (END GOAL IN DEVELOPMENT)!!!!

Defeat enemies and destroy crates to increase POWER level, once the level turns green, the exit will open!

Enjoy the exploration of the enemy filled mazes, and the action packed race sequences to avoid the sweepers!

CONTROLS:

As this game is still in development, please be mindful that the controls may change as development progresses!

  • W,A,S,D - Movement!
  • SPACE - Fire weapons!
  • SHIFT - Enter strafe mode!
  • CTRL - Enter speed mode! // Entering speed mode disables weapons, so be careful!

ONCE YOU HAVE OBTAINED THE MISSILE UPGRADE!

  • SHIFT - Now enters Missile Mode, which functions like strafe mode, however when you fire your weapons, you will be able to fire a missile instead!
  • ENTER - Remotely detonate a fired missile!

As stated this game is still in development, and as such there may be unforeseen errors or issues! please contact me either here or at my email ADREntertainment@gmail.com !
